title: Gymitize Biodegradable Gym Wipes, Surface Wipes, Antibacterial, 100% Biodegradable, Made in the UK, 100% Plant Fibre, 0% Plastic, 500 Refills Per Pack, (1 Pack)
features: Made in the UK & kills 99.99% of germs in 30 Seconds including Norovirus, flu virus, and MRSA. GymiTize antibacterial wipes eliminate bacteria, germs, and viruses including Norovirus, flu virus, and MRSA in under 30 seconds, ensuring a non-smear, sanitized surface for your gym equipment. Alcohol free, user friendly, dermatologically tested. 500 wipes (1 Pack). Skin Safe & Pet Safe.

Revolutionary single-use wipes for unmatched hygiene: Our disposable disinfectant wipes provide uncompromised hygiene and exceptional cleaning performance, promoting a clean and safe environment in every use. Alcohol free, user friendly, dermatologically tested. UK's No.1 Gym wipe. 100% biodegradable and all packaging is 100% recyclable

Alcohol-Free formula safe for all surfaces: Optimized to leave gym equipment sparkling clean without damaging materials, GymiTize wipes are safe for screens, nickel plating, vinyl, and more – no cracking or rusting. - Non Toxic - Safe on all surfaces including VDU's

Advanced barrier technology for Long-Lasting Protection: Forms a protective barrier on surfaces that continues to work for up to 30 days, providing ongoing antimicrobial protection after each application.

Environmentally safe & non-Irritant Formulation: Contains cationic biocides that effectively destroy bacteria without harming the environment or causing irritation to users. All packaging is made from Recycled Materials and is 100% Recyclable

Our anti bacterial wipes conforms to the highest safety standards: GymiTize wipes adhere to multiple BS/EN standards, ensuring compliance with top safety and efficacy benchmarks for infection control.

Gym Equipment Wipes. Alcohol Free, Non-Toxic, Recyclable, Vegan Gym Cleaner. Safe to use on all Surfaces including Screens. Lemon Scented Gym Wipes, Refill Rolls available. Made in the UK. 1 X 1000 Wipe Refill, Wipe Size: 200mm X 200mm.
Comes in Sealed Bag, to be used as a replacement Refill Roll in Dispensers and Bucket Dispensers
description: Product Description GymiTize Eco, Plant Based Gym Hygiene, Made in the UK Gymitize ECO kills 99.9% of Harmful Bacteria and Germs in under 30 seconds leaving a smear free sanitised surface. This Plant Based, skin safe, single use wipe promotes uncompromised hygiene, alongside outstanding cleaning performance. Gymitize specialist Alcohol Free Gym Wipes have been optimised to leave a sparkling clean surface without harming the user and the integrity of your gym equipment. GymiTize Eco conforms to: BS / EN 1275, 1276, 1500, 1656, 12791, 13623, 13697, 13727, 14348, 14476 More about GymiTize Eco GymiTize Eco contains an alcohol free advanced multi surface cleaner and sanitiser that contains fast acting Antibacterial properties. This ground breaking cleaner is effective within 30 seconds, kills 99.9999% of harmful Bacteria yet contains no irritants within its formulation. Selected cationic Biocides gives GymiTize the effectiveness to destroy bacteria yet remain harmless to the user. We are using the latest Advanced Barrier Technology in our products. This forms a long lasting barrier onto surfaces that continues to work for up to 30 days after the initial application. GymiTize Eco Gym Wipes are: Plant Based, Alcohol Free, Non-Toxic, and contain 0% Plastic. Our Wipes contain 0% Plastic Members of UK Active Made from 100% Cellulose Alcohol and Bleach Free GymiTize Eco 500 Wipe Refill Roll UK's Plant Based Gym Wipe Brand Made from 100% Plant Fibre Alcohol Free, User Friendly. Not Tested on Animals. Alcohol Free, Non Toxic, Skin Safe, 0% Plastic Wipes Safe on all surfaces including VDU's Kills: 99.99% of germs & Harmful Bacteria GymiTize Eco 500 Wipe Bucket Fast Acting: Kills germs & Bacteria in under 30 seconds, Barrier Control. Keeps surfaces Bacteria free for up to 30 days. Natural Lemon Scented Fast Evaporating formula Wipe Size: 200mm x 200mm No Cracking, Rusting or drying out of surfaces. Made in the UK GymiTize Wall Mounted Dispenser Our Wet Wipe Dispensers are asthetically pleasing and are manufactured in the UK. ​ Lockable Dispenser - For perforated refill packs - Maximum roll size – 230mm high and 220mm diameter ​ Suitable for use in all areas, garages, service stations, schools, kitchens, Gyms & Leisure Centres ​ Suitable for alcohol and non-alcohol wipes - Manufactured in the UK GymiTize Eco Refill Roll GymiTize Eco Bucket Organic Food / Beverage Safe Wipes MultiTize Eco Multi Purpose Wipes. 500 Wipe Bucket TaniTize Sunbed and Salon Wipes. 500 Wipe Bucket and 500 Wipe Refill GymiTize Gym Wipes 10 x 1000 Wipe Refill Rolls.
